item.title: Birds of a Feather: Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile @Chicago Roboto
item.author: nisrulz@gmail.com (Nishant Srivastava)
item.description: Chicago Roboto Online Abstract KMM or Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile is evolving rapidly. So much so that many companies already use it in production. KMM brings a paradigm shift in sharing code between mobile platforms in a way that allows for greater control over what is shared while leaving the native UI code to the platform.
item.dc:creator: Nishant Srivastava
